content: lion brand pattern # 60043 and alternate version elegant beaded necklace 1 #60044 skill level easy level 2 size one size length about 56 inch / 142 cm materials * one skein lame article #960 *discontinued* * size c-2/ 2 75 mm crochet hook * 38 6 -mm amber bicone beads a -or- 32 6x8-mm aqua beads for elegant version #60044 * 19 10-mm round faceted glass beads b -or- 16 12-mm square rose beads for elegant version #60044 * clear nail polish to prevent yarn ends from unraveling gauge 12 chains = 2 inch / 5 cm beads are strung onto the yarn before crocheting the chain knots are placed at bead sections for security 1 http //www lionbrand com/crochet-pattern-elegant-beaded-necklace-1 html
